description:
Socket an Artifact's [slot_trait] Trait Slot with this item to gain this trait:\n\nConduit Strike:
This creature can equip an additional Spell Gem for each unique class among your creatures. When this creature {ACTION_attacks}, it consumes a {STAT_charge} from each of its Spell Gems to deal additional damage equal to 5% of its lowest stat for each consumed {STAT_charge}. This creature cannot {ACTION_cast} spells.
name: Energy Glove
